website_summaries.verdict: A convenient, go-anywhere solution — but don't throw sharp things in it.
cons: Fabric cannot be removed and could puncture with rough treatment

website_summaries.verdict: This collapsible cart offers plenty of space and is easy to store.
pros: Simple to set up in just seconds
Heavy-duty frame provides support for loads up to 150 pounds
Includes an adjustable handle and two cup holders for added convenience
Mesh fabric offers tremendous strength and durability
Available in a variety of eye-catching colors
cons: Wheels sometimes shake and wobble and may come off the cart, even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: Love this wagon
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon. We have a rescued pitbull. He had been through many hurtful events . He struggles to walk long distance with the rest of our pack. He loves his wagon, and thinks while in his wagon he gets excited to be able to keep up with his brothers. Our pitbull is a therapy dog we take in his wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spence

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, I received a knock off!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wagon on 7/1, it came 7/7. I immediately noticed how incredibly light the product felt. It is not heavy duty construction or stable at all..it is wobbly and wheels are not easy to direct and it is also a lot smaller than a Macwagon should be. It definitely seems collapsible as in will break while in use. It did come in a Macwagon box but it is NOT an authentic Macwagon. I have used a friend’s Macwagon on numerous occasions which lead me to purchase my own. The carrying case does not have the logo. I will definitely be sending this back. I am so disappointed in this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: NOT A BEACH WAGON!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wagon, after reading reviews and the description, to use for our family beach trips. The description of the wagon indicates that it is "great for beach trips", as did a few reviews, however, on our first trip to the beach with the wagon, we found that the wheels would not move in the sand. I should have suspected such, with the slim wheels, but was a bit hopeful because the seller's description indicated it would be great for beach trips, which was my primary reason for buying the wagon. It was definitely smooth moving on the sidewalk, and held all our beach gear well. Just was a pain to drag through the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Hello all, hope manufacturer/Amazon can back up the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello all, hope manufacturer/Amazon can back up the quality of this product. I used this to carry my son baseball gear (30-35lbs). The bottom metal assembly has broken in multiple places photos are coming. I never allowed anyone else to close it because I wanted to make sure it was done correctly. I would hope I get a credit for my $80plus dollars I spend.. Lasted a bit over 3 months with 3 days a week of use..
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Poveda

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy--shoddy product--broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it in February but used it for the first time today to take a box of toy wooden building blocks, weighing about 50 lbs, to my grandson's apartment, several blocks away from us, in Brooklyn. It is a walk of less than 10 minutes. One of the front, swiveling wheel, snapped off where it was welded to the frame--luckily I was able to complete the delivery with the three wheels. The tires are still pristine--it was used the first time! This is such a shoddy product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Braun

customer_reviews.title: It works great on hard surfaces but not great for the beach ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this wagon. Bought it to use for the beach. It works great on hard surfaces but not great for the beach unless your beach is hard sand and not baby powder sand like the beach we go to. It folds up so nicely. Overall it's a great wagon. Just not great for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: bozzygti

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel fell off after two days; no help from Mac Sports
customer_reviews.text: The four little spot welds are entirely too weak to support the pressure on the front wheel connection with only a fraction of the state weight capacity. At most we had 50 lbs in the wagon and this was clearly too much. This can be strengthened only with a square bracket bolted over the wheel verticals to the horizontal bar. And even then, it wouldn't add a lot of strength. Better to buy a wagon with the front wheels embedded inside the corner verticals. To add insult to injury, the company managed to avoid taking responsibility and refused my warranty claim.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Stryder

customer_reviews.title: Life enhancing
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful wagon. My husband and I use it to haul groceries from our car, through the garage, into the elevator, down the hallway, and into the kitchen of our condo. It easily carts a week's worth of groceries eliminating heavy lifting and multiple trips to bring in the groceries. Everything comes up in one trip. The wagon has a wide wheel base that adds stability and strength. The wagon saves us time and energy. It is ironic that a playtime vehicle for children is a life enhancing vehicle for seniors.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncookie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This wagon is great. Bought to cart around my two 13 year old disabled corgis. The best thing....no assembly! Ready to roll right out of the box. Only used once, but it seems durable and easy to maneuver. My girls can now enjoy going with us instead of being left at home due to mobility issues. They give it 5 fraps! (stars)
customer_reviews.author: cupcake_queen

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Wagon
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit wagon. Cheap knockoff. Buyer beware. Returned then bought real deal locally. Big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately on the second use the wheel fell off. Cheaply made. Total waste of money . That is $35 for each use, very short trips. What do I like: I would have liked the way the wagon folds up. Unfortunately I won't get to use it since I only have 3 wheels. Based on prior reviews about their return policy, I won't bother to attempt a return. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: doedoe

customer_reviews.title: too bad. was really looking forward to this.
customer_reviews.text: pretty sure i got a faulty product. the frame is metal and one of the back wheels is completely diagonal. it squeeks when it moves and is hard to pull even with nothing in it. Everytime any weight is in this thing the frame (where the wheel is jacked up) looks like itll cave in. i really needed this for beach/pool trips... camping.. etc. but this is not something that will ever be used again bc it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Michayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, seriously.... BUY THIS WAGON!
customer_reviews.text: I, seriously, could not be happier with my wagon! I’ve wanted one for a good 6 months now, but kept going back and forth. Let me tell you what... ORDER THIS BAD BOY!! It is 100% worth every penny. It is so incredibly easy to fold and unfold. My kids love it! 10000x better than the stroller struggle. Fits in the trunk so much better! I can throw all our goodies in there with my kid and still have plenty of room. This is what dreams are made of, people!! It has cup holders!!!! This is like the dress with pockets of wagons! AND it has a one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hardin

customer_reviews.title: The Wheel Broke Off on the Second Use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We're previously wrote a review for how great this cart is for the beach after 1 use. The second time we used it the wheel broke right off! We were at the same sandy lake as last time with an even lighter load and as we were pulling this cart in the sand the wheel came right off! We change our review, I wouldn't recommend this product. Extremely disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: crabby125

customer_reviews.title: Can’t decide
customer_reviews.text: Came broke. Love the size of the wagon. Larger than I expected. but disappointed. It says no assembly required so we were at a huge baseball tournament & i got it out of the box to realize it was ripped. I had no option but to use it. So not it can’t be returned.
customer_reviews.author: whitney b

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made with poor return policy
customer_reviews.text: after light use for five months the weld on the wheel gave out and the wheel fell off. Result of inferior welding of cheap steel. then according to Amazon, I can't return it thru them. Mac Sports website will replace it if I give them my credit card number and wants me to pay for shipping. DON'T waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: DawN Keener

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Compared to Previous Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this wagon's production has declined over time. We ordered three in early 2017 and they were great. We wanted two more, but the new ones are made of shoddy material and the metal has bent with only minimal use. Thanks to Amazon's wonderful customer service, they are being returned for a full refund due to being defective. I do not recommend these unless they get back to their better production quality.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD 150lbs
customer_reviews.text: We used these wagons to carry pylons around to our flag football fields. We've used them 3 times with a max of 75lbs in them and 2 of the 3 already have bent to where you can't pull them anymore. The back wheels are now rubbing the underside of the wagon. I also paid $75 a pop and now they're $60. SO bummed! Now I have the rest of the season to get through without wagons.
customer_reviews.author: Carlye S

customer_reviews.title: By all appearances, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Swift shipping, very easy set up , strong. Awkwardly ΗEAVY for this senior citizen ~ 22.5 #. Not sure if I can handle it. We will see. Read other reviews before purchase: folded, the cart does not stand on its own for strapping closed; and the box was not the authentic Mac advised by other reviewer. Have I been misled? All questions to consider. I will continue to test it for my needs. 1 week later: unable to use. I am not strong enough to pull or push it. Physical disability prevents me from using this neat cart. I must look for a smaller, smoother cart. I am being charged $17.00 for return shipping. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Garbage wagon
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. One wheel was broken when it came out of the package! It is afring wheel do if you turn or go over a bump the wheel falls off. The front tires do not turn very well at all and it pulls poorly. We bought it for the beach, but it doesn’t pull through any type of sand well at all. Overall a poor design and should never be purchased
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Beach!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cart to take to the beach and it did not disappoint!! We were able to take all the toys and snacks for a fun day without worrying about not being able to carry it all. We didn’t go that far on the beach but for where we did go, it did just fine on the sand. I like that it folds up for when you want to transport or store it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that this wagon would not be able to hold heavy items. I had read the reviews of less expensive models failing to carry moderate loads. However it held up well, to a Med-small loaded cooler, briefcases with laptops, books and binders. When I go to conventions, I do not pack light. The pattern was perfect, I can easily see my cart from a distance. It folds up easily and has a storage cover. It only folds in half, so if you are short on storage space, this might its only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: KellyH

customer_reviews.title: Sure it worked...
customer_reviews.text: It worked, but is not a real MAC wagon. I did a lot of reading and research before I made the purchase. I have a lot of friends who have a MAC. I compared them side by side and mine seems cheaper made, there are no labels or tags on mine either. The real ones have warning labels and tags on it. I wanted to return it but I missed the window by 2 days! And I cant not find a way to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Werff

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - wheel broke off during first use!
customer_reviews.text: First one I got ripped as I removed it from box. Returned. Second one failed during first use, wheel folded under due to flimsy welding/attachments of wheel to axle (see pics). Sadly my window to return has passed.
customer_reviews.author: rchinasheville

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month of use
customer_reviews.text: We used this less than 10 times in a span over a month and the metal bar that holds the front wheels bent a little and now their is no control of the cart and it’s essentially useless. Really disappointed in this product. Hoping the manufacture can help because Amazon refused.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Ok beach wagon
customer_reviews.text: I got this wagon to take it to the beach and it held pretty well wheeling it on top of the sand. As long as your wagon is not super heavy, you’ll have no problem pulling it on top of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Agapito

customer_reviews.title: NOT for the beach!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great for any other reason, but but for the beach. I need another person to help me pull this on the sand. Do not buy if you want a beach cart. Like I said, great on pavement, going up hills, on grass. Another cool point. The front wheels swivel, which makes pulling it around easier to maneuver. The handle locks which make it easy to pull. Overall a good cart. P.S I added a picture of my dog in the cart, to show how big it is!!!! He's 22lbs, and I have plenty of room left over. Good for a large shopping trip :). P.P.S I won't be using this for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wagon
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems sturdy and haven’t been able to use it out, due to being stuck inside (COVID 19). Just FYI when you get this product make sure to check it’s the real one because the first time i ordered it, they sent me one used or a knockoff. It was scratched on the handle and there was no tag and one of the straps was frayed so i returned and they sent a replacement. This one had a tag (mac sports ) and even the box had all the pictures of the wagon on it. The previous one was a simple brown box, no name, no tag. Anyway will update if anything changes with the function or durability.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Totally mommy-approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used in airport for luggage and carseat. What a Godsend! Held even more on the way home off the plane- carries a lot of weight. Also, United shipped it for free at the gate- in place of my stroller. And it folds up and opens easily and quick! Totally mommy-approved!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life!!??! I love it!! This Cart is big and very sturdy! I tested it out coming home from the grocery store.. I put two 24 cases of bottled water and 5 grocery bags and still had room for more!! I rolled it right into my apartment with no problems whatsoever! Works great! If I didn’t have this I would’ve made four trips back-and-forth from my car to my apartment. All smiles!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Horton

customer_reviews.title: If you want something like this, get this brand! I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wagon! Bought for work, used also for moving, gardening, laundry, shopping, vacationing, getting stuff into rental house, to beach- but not on sand, bad for the bearings. But every other terrain- Awesome!! It has paid for itself so many times and I recommend it to everyone! It was maybe $20 more than the other similar brand I was considering, and so happy I went with this one having now seen both. Bigger, much better tires/wheels, better maneuverability, better construction and materials. BUY IT! Seriously one of the best purchases I’ve ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Tallman

customer_reviews.title: This was used, broken and
customer_reviews.text: Sheared off aluminum rivets and mangled plastic piece sitting inside the cart when I opened the box, which looked like it was taped up by a six year old. I repaired the missing rivets with bolts, because it wasn't worth my time to return it. It will work ok for the intended use, however the use of aluminum rivets for wheel axels is a rather poor choice of material and I expect those to fail as others have pointed out. I guess you get what you pay for... or at least you are supposed to get what you pay for. In this case, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: g.b.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wagon for use around my yard. It arrived in a timely matter and required no assembly. It comes with a nice ccover that's easy to put on. The wagon folds up super easy and is easy to carry. The only thing I don't like are the wheels. When I used it in my yard the wheels kept getting filled with dirt. I had to take a stick and clean the dirt out multiple times otherwise the wheels wouldn't move. In all fairness it is early Spring, so my yard is wet. Overall for the price and the fact that I don't need it often, I would probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel fell off
customer_reviews.text: Only used this a dozen times over the course of 6 months. The welds on the wheels is so small that one of the front wheels just snapped off. It was not very easy to pull either, and if the ground is wet at all the wheels would get jammed up in a few minutes with a little mud/grass/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chad P.

customer_reviews.title: Broke with minimal use in less than three months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 2 1/2 months, I’ve used it at most 1-2 times a week and tonight the cord broke to fold the wagon back up so it got stuck, in the rain, while I played around with it to get it folded it back up. I’m unhappy this lasted less than three months
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Folds up in one snap, very roomy, rolls great, easy to steer, heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: DrIndie

customer_reviews.title: very happy with my cart
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than I thought,which is exciting It's easy to open.It came with a cute cover. It has 2 cute pockets in front for water bottle etc.There is a catch so your handle will stay put on the cart upright.. You can telescope the handle, then lock it ,or shorten it too.. It was the last one I looked at and I loved the "americana"print. I plan on packing my blow up kayak in it and there's definitely enough room for it and my accessories. I'm so glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Every busy family needs this. We use it to carry our sports equipment, beach gear, and even our two young kids (1 and 3 years old). The wheels are very sturdy. We've used it over grass and gravel and it rolls without issue. The handle also extends out and it locks securely in place when not used. The whole cart also folds and unfolds easily and isn't too heavy when loading in and out of the car. I've seen this in stores, but it was a much better price here. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon. Bought it because I was moving to a new apartment in the same complex. My wagon made many trips carrying boxes, smaller pieces of furniture, dishes, holiday decorations, etc. It maneuvers well, quick set up and folds easily. It fits in the trunk of my car. The grandkids pull each other around. It is also used to carry groceries as my place is not close to a parking lot. Very useful. Would I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CART CUTE...
customer_reviews.text: It came on time....Was already assembled folded up in the box...its very cute and seems really sturdy...the wheels are huge and can probably do sand...cause in grass it does great....I have 1 problem with it....Stearing it.....the front wheels should have been hooked to the handle....so when you turn the handle the wheels turn with it......instead the front wheels spin freely and the back wheel dont spin at all......not sure I like that.....found myself picking up the back end to pharrell park it.....its not aweful ...it just takes some getting use to....I cut up a box to line the bottom of the cart and to give it added support and to help keep it clean......
customer_reviews.author: TIMEOUT

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love This Wagon!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This one item has really changed my life! Ok, I'm being a little hyperbolic but not that much, really! My husband and I recently moved into a condo with an elevator. But the elevator and our parking space are located a fair distance from our door and carrying groceries in has been a lot of work. Hey? We're seniors, ok? 😜 This little wagon is perfect ~ it folds up, making it easy to keep in the car. When we get back from shopping, all we need to do is "unfold and load" it, then wheel it to the building's front door, step into the elevator and within minutes, arrive at our door. Voila!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn W

customer_reviews.title: Makes my beach days care free!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase!! Came exactly as advertised from the 'warehouse.' Box was damaged...big deal! Got it $40 less than anywhere else! Don't need the box anyway...wagon was perfect. Easy to maneuver, holds everything I need to haul to the beach! Was getting tired of all the lugging myself since I don't have help and my beach days were dwindling. Finally, I got the bright idea to find a wagon and, bam!! Along came this number!! Just perfect. Folds up easily and holds everything you need! Comes in handy to transport yard gear and equipment from car to back yard and groceries for a one stop haul! I love this wagon.. Amazon rocks!!!
customer_reviews.author: LynnieM

customer_reviews.title: Very strong CHEMICAL odor.
customer_reviews.text: The strong chemical odor of the product was overwhelming. It's very hard to maneuver; I could barely get it out of the box. I appreciate the fact that it's made in the U.S., but the odor is overwhelming and too cumbersome/heavy for me. Great concept. This is exactly what I was looking for, a collapsible folding wagon, something that is great for so many different uses. I would use it for sure if it didn't have such a strong chemical odor. Right back in the box it goes. I've missed the return window, bummer.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Save your receipt -- you may need it
customer_reviews.text: Save your receipt because you may need to make a warranty claim. My wagon was purchased in August 2019. One wheel never managed to touch the ground -- it skittered wildly and did pirouettes around itself 100% of the time. Then, a little over three months later, in November, the wheel simply fell off making it awfully difficult and inconvenient to pick the wagon up and load it into the car. The design of this foldable wagon is nifty, no doubt about that; the execution in manufacturing and assembly is another matter.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It works perfectly for work! I travel from school to school and have lots of supplies (even a heavy laptop) to take with me. I was so stressed all day so I decided to invest in this wagon. OMG! Best thing ever! It’s a life changer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Duran

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a beach cart
customer_reviews.text: I purposely ordered this for the beach. When it arrived the back wheel was bent so that it rubbed against the frame constantly. Then upon trying to bring to the beach IT SUCK! This is not a beach cart. The wheels are too narrow to roll over the soft sand and the handle is not long enough to adequately pull it if you are over 5'5". Total piece of crap. Went back to my Tommy Bahama REAL beach cart.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Back saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional face painter, and I have to carry a lot of equipment with me to my gigs. This wagon makes it easy to carry everything - chair, table, and supplies, all in one trip!!! No more running back and forth to the car, and the wagon is just the right size to roll under my table while I am working, making packing up just as easy and fast as loading in.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received this with bubbles all over the metal. The bubbles are raised and rusted. The amount of money I paid for this and it to show defective is extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey murdock

customer_reviews.title: Welds on all support brackets broke after three months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in march for hauling softball gear around and it's now the end of June and all the support brackets on the underside are broken off. All the supports along the bottom are just tack welded and not even well. The weld looked like it was over the coating of the metal and it did not adhere hardly at all. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Cute, and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have considered purchasing a utility wagon for a few years. When I found out I had limited time to remove my belongings from my classroom for the summer during the pandemic, I ordered this wagon. Now that I have it, I wish I had ordered it sooner. Honestly, I chose this one because it’s pink. I am very satisfied with its durability and love that it folds for easy storage. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near the stated size
customer_reviews.text: Product description says 32" x 20.1" x 17.4" inside capacity. Actual is much smaller - 32" x 17 1/8" x 10" Bought this to carry specific items, so was a waste of time. If you just want a wagon, then it's fine. ( its an actual Mac wagon, came in a Mac coloured cardboard box) EDIT: Today I see a new "Mac Wagon RENEWED" product that has the dimensions I reported. *&^U(R-s sent me a renewed wagon.
customer_reviews.author: wildpack

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy items.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to make small deliveries. When contents exceed 50 to 60lbs steering ( pushing or pulling) gets a little tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: stop scrolling and buy it
customer_reviews.text: just buy this cart already. You've been looking at it and wondering if its worth the money. IT IS FAM! You can fit, 3 boogie boards, 2 adult size folding chairs, 2 child folding chairs. A beach umbrella, a huge target bag full of found shells and sand toys (Mainly shells you will never use). Uh,... a smaller cooler that fits 8 Natty Daddy's(that's the equivalent to 16 beers - KaChow!) Go to the beach in style fam. You won't look cool, but you will only need to make 1 trip. Flex on 'em. Let 'em know your time is $$$$$$
customer_reviews.author: Yonny

customer_reviews.title: An item like this is not used everyday
customer_reviews.text: Wagon broke 3rd time using it. Wheels shake uncontrollably and seller won't return or replace because it's after 30 days. An item like this is not used everyday, so when you are on the 40th day and only it's 3rd use and it breaks...your out 90 bucks. That's $45 for each time I used it. I could have rented a car for that much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to roll, handle is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Easy to manuever rolling cart that really does a great job holding weight and carrying stuff. Rolls smoothly. Cute pattern. Strong fabric material. Strong wheels. CONS: I've pinched myself several times folding up the cart. The cart does not stay upright once folded unless I turn it on its side. It's heavy. BUMMED ABOUT THE HANDLE!! The handle on the cart is not sturdy. It does not stay in the upright locked position. It does not stay in the frame holder. Maybe I got a bad handle on this cart? I sure wish the handle was much better. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Grocery wagon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wagon because I live in an apartment complex and didn't want to take more than 1 trip from my car to my apartment to drop off groceries. This is easy to maneuver and a good size for the groceries I buy. I love that it folds up to I can store it easily in my closet. I do wish I could have it stand on the wheels when folded but you have to turn it upside down for it to stand up firmly. Anyways, this worked better than the shopping carts available on amazon because it allows me to lay my groceries out without everything being on top of each other.
customer_reviews.author: SLe

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this thing non stop all week moving boxes and groceries from car to elevator to the apartment. It has been through the paces. I am extremely happy with this buy. It rolls smoothly. I have been over sidewalk, cobblestone, and grass. It unfolds and folds quickly and easily. It takes up almost no room in the apartment, it sits nicely against the wall by the door. You have to make sure one of the wheels is turned perpendicular to the others to keep it upright. Definitely one of my better buys.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee N. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't  I buy one sooner?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to unfold and fold up. The bag is a bit of a pain so I will only be using it when I plan to store it for a long period of time. Even my five year old can unfold nd fold this thing easily!
customer_reviews.author: Wv Mama

customer_reviews.title: great doggie wagon!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I needed a wagon for my aging dog and this one is perfect. Folds easily, and he's comfortable in it (with a dog crate liner for padding). It really handles well on uneven ground. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: MaxwellTheCat

customer_reviews.title: Fairly light and easy to use, handle is defective design,overprised
customer_reviews.text: As with most products Made In China ,there is frequently some aspect that is bothersome and doe snot function adequately. The cradle for the handle on this wagon does not secure the handle well, which keeps dropping down.These wagons are very practical for hauling.I wish Chinese products has more aluminum in them in oder to lessen the overall weight.The steel used is primitive and heavy.In view of these drawbacks I think this wagon is overpriced...
customer_reviews.author: gabe

customer_reviews.title: Beware of knockoffs!
customer_reviews.text: I figured out after it broke that I got a knockoff when ordering this wagon. Mine broke at the weld joint to the back right wheel. I ordered the Macwagon after seeing such a high review and so many sold, but realized I was in the same boat as other reviews of this product. My handle is completely different, the UPC tag is different, and the quality is not equal to the one pictured. My cart hauls 4 folding chairs 150 yards down a paved street to the beach walkover. I'll purchase another brand, or wait till Dick's has them back in stock to make sure I'm getting the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Aircraft800

customer_reviews.title: I would look for different models
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 wagons because of great reviews. I owned the wagons for less than a year and a wheel fell off that is unfixable on one. It was literally used twice- the wagon is in mint shape with a busted wheel. I wouldn’t purchase again- waste of $75.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Varner

customer_reviews.title: Toxic chemicals & cancer warning!
customer_reviews.text: This item comes with a cancer & birth defect warning and when you open the box there is a very strong chemical smell. Did not want this in my house. I don't know why they have to put the toxic chemical coating on the fabric but be warned, not safe for your children or pets to ride in!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Petrov

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome but great wagon
customer_reviews.text: Got this for on sale for a beach trip. I read reviews that this is not good on sand so I mentally prepared and thankfully didn't have to drag this through the sand by myself. It is what it is b/c despite it not being good on sand, it's a great wagon and held ALL our stuff. It's really big so it's cumbersome, but it's great it's really big and holds so much. I'm glad we have it for future trips, outings etc., whether or not it involves sand.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT---light weight--easy to fold/unfold--doesn't take up much storage space
customer_reviews.text: Use to bring groceries from vehicle into house as I have no steps. Wagon makes it so much easier and is easy to maneuver inside. I have had hip & knee replacements and carrying items while walking is difficult. I also have an ATV that has a hitch (also purchased this hitch from Amazon) for pulling trash receptacles and with the wagon having a large handle, can also pull it behind ATV. Also planning to use at beach when Covid 19 calms down a bit more here in Fl for toting a cooler & chairs.
customer_reviews.author: B J M

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectation
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for bringing groceries from car to condo. Its super easy to open up and fold away for storage. No assembly of parts was necessary. We used it today on a trip to a warehouse store. We filled it will some heavy items and it rolled so nice and smooth. Very solid and quiet. The handle extends to wherever you are comfortable using it and can be locked in place. It turns corners well. Great purchase!! Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item it was a last minute decision- I needed a collapsible wagon for a Girl Scout trip but didn’t want to blow $100+ for a weekend event. Well this item arrived and is super easy to assemble (pull apart and click) th handle even locks and extends! This item can hold 6 sleeping backs plus other gear with no issue! This is holding up much better than expected! It can even handle uneven/ gravel ground. WATERPARK, camping, and daily use approved!! Can be easily pushed or pulled by children or adults! Even had a couple small pockets that I used to store my phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever survive without one of these?
customer_reviews.text: Got this primarily for all the chairs and gear we take to the kids soccer games. Awesome to have especially when you have to park rather far away from the fields. Now I use it for other things as well - toting gear to the park, taking groceries in from the car (now that plastic bags are banned in CA). Great for moving several things at once and avoiding extra trips/effort. No issues whatsoever with the wagon. Works exactly how it should. If there's one thing I would change it would be to have it stand up when folded.
customer_reviews.author: BCM1

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I moved into an apartment building with an elevator and knew I needed a wagon. I accidentally ordered two and figured I would give away one of them after I was done moving. These wagons were lifesavers and helped so much with the move. They’re so handy to keep in the trunk for groceries or bringing up multiple large packages. My partner and I are keeping both of them because we love them so much and will use them. My only critique is that the make very wide turns.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Best transporter (groceries, boxes and more)!
customer_reviews.text: Best cart ever! Transported groceries and other items like boxes in it. Easy to fold/unfold, aesthetically pleasing, heavy duty, perfect helper to avoid multiple trips to the car. Design is beautiful, arrived quick and free of damage. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Yailet

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cart to load and unload large items down my dock to my boat. It collapses and folds easily into the truck but after using for only 1 month, the steel is beginning to rust! This is not a cheaply made item nor is it disposable so I would have expected the material to be made well for the price and for longevity. I would appreciate if someone contacts me for specifics and resolution. If I have to replace this after this short amount of time, I will be looking for another version, product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wagon! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a mac wagon about 7 or 8 years ago. Still using it! Holds up to 150 lbs! I know because we used this to move a love seat! Took the top part off and hauled it up to an apartment, then the tops. Bought one for my neighbor and for 2 of my sister over the years. They rave about how much they love and use them. I bought my daughter in law and son the mac sports wagon and they love it and use it all the time for grocery shopping and whatever.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. I use it for my condo, camping and general chores. This cart makes taking groceries from the parking lot to the condo a breeze. No more taking multiple trips to unload my car. While camping I like to put my cooler and cooking gear in it. It handles uneven terrain fairly well. I would imagine that heavy duty use or repetitive use on dusty/muddy, uneven surfaces would probably break it. But, for light weight work like unloading the car or tailgating this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: HerbieHancock

customer_reviews.title: No instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids for baseball season. No instructions, the strap to make it fold is either too small or incorrectly placed! One strap came starting to unravel. Not sure I'll keep it or just give up and try to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: OKAY BUT THERE ARE BETTER OPTIONS
customer_reviews.text: I was turned off from the minute I saw the box. It was not sealed at the bottom. When I opened it, the product was complete but it felt cheaply made. The clips on the straps for the cover came right off and it took me forever to put them back on. Not even sure if they went on right. I compared this to the Ozark Trail wagon from Walmart which a friend had and this didn't match up to it. That one also cost less. It was a no brainer to return. Sorry Amazon I still love you. Never had any issues before, but this time I just found a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse special
customer_reviews.text: I got this item from Amazon warehouse. They said it was a very good item, and they were not kidding. it was in great condition. it was easy to straighten out into full working wagon, pretty easy to pull. Had to use my brain a bit to fold it back up, but it was no big deal. It did the job of giving my senior dog a break when she needed it. I am not sure about the durability yet, and I'm pretty convinced the handle is not always going to stay put, when put in resting position. However, I am pretty pleased, and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The front wheels caved in after less than 6 months. I cannot recommend this product. I loved it in the beginning, but the claims that it will hold 150 lbs is an overstatement to say the least. I’m disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C. Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great little wagon
customer_reviews.text: I move around quite often and was tired of trying to find luggage wagons in various locations. My suitcase is a spinner, but what about the remainder of the stuff I thought. Well, this little wagon is perfect for my needs. It's easy to fold and maneuver, and can hold plenty of stuff - very sturdy. I'm old and weak (!) but even I have no difficulty folding it up and lifting it in and out of the car. I don't think it would work well on non-tarmac surfaces e.g. a beach because the wheels would need to be bigger and wider but for getting to / from a building on paved surfaces it's perfect. A good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy, NO FREE RETURN
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious about this item. It is very large and way too heavy for me to load and unload it from my car everyday at the beach. Also, I want to return it but the return fee is almost 25% of the original purchase cost. Total buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use and practical wagon. Can even keep it in your trunk!
customer_reviews.text: Love pretty much everything about this handy dandy wagon. It’s big sturdy handle makes it easy to transport almost anything, the wheels are sturdy and not cheapish. The only place it was difficult to move around on was the sand at the beach but pretty much everything is more difficult on the sand, right? Otherwise it’s great for the park, for the sidewalk, for vacations, even for everyday use. Definitely recommend and it’s at a good price point. We’ve had this wagon for more than a year and it’s still in excellent shape love the little cover it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: MssyNorX

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Inside Container Size was Smaller
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality build of the product and the nice rubber tire size that was useful in pulling up steps. One problem for me was that the inside measurements were not as reported in the ad. I expected the inside measurementsbe for the canvas container part and not the height including wheels, etc which is of little use to storage space. The true useful inside measurements were: 31 1/2" length, 17" wide, 10" deep. Barely gave enough container space to hold half of what I wanted in terms of height and so I had to use straps and load less on the wagon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shehane

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for Convention Goers
customer_reviews.text: Are you a ridiculous nerd who goes to conventions with overflowing suitcases of cosplay, enough snacks to feed an army, enough booze to kill one, and probably some room decorations besides? ... even if you aren't, just buy one of these darn things. If you're waffling about it, you should just go ahead. You'll thank me when you're trying frantically to pack up your room before check-out and lug it all across the hotel to your vehicle. I'm sure it's probably good for warehouse shopping or camping or something, but it's REALLY good for absolute mountains of nerd debris.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bickers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of collapsible wagons before purchasing this one, and I'm glad I did! This wagon opens and closes so easily (not like so many strollers today), and it is plenty big enough and sturdy enough to carry my grandchildren. Although not advertised for this purpose, I use mine when I visit zoos and parks with my toddler and preschool grandchildren. They often get tired of walking, and this is perfect. It also holds the cooler, extra clothes, towels, beach toys, groceries, diaper bags, etc. I am getting a lot of use out of this wagon, and it fits easily in the trunk of my Camry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Took a licking, keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.text: Well, for something both Amazon and USPS said had been lost it's a miracle it made the trip successfully. Along the way it appears to have been run over by not one but three separate trucks, both item box and shipping box taped to heck and back. The wagon suffered no injuries whatsoever which just seems wrong? The thought of taking a documentary photo just exhausted me so I'll leave the level of squishedness up to your imaginations. I'm pretty sure the little difficulty in maneuverability is operator error so my rating may change.
customer_reviews.author: Tangelo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This wagon was invaluable when I was cleaning out someone's apartment. It went easily around the tight corners you find in apartments, rolled well on carpet, hard floors, grassy yard, pavement. I am an older person and had no trouble folding it up, maneuvering it, lifting the back to help go around tight corners, getting in and out of the back seat of my car. It is a very lightweight item but very sturdy. Holds a lot. I purchased the straps and the cargo net that go with it, although I didn't use either for this task. Well worth the price. (Note: I don't recall having to 'assemble' anything - it came out of the box ready to go.)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago, I fell and hurt my back. I could no longer carry grocery bags or laundry baskets. I bought rolling hampers for the laundry but they were impossible to roll in the snow. My back is healed and I'm still using this cart to bring groceries in from the car and cart laundry around. I love that I can get all my groceries into the house with one trip. It won't handle deep snow, but it works well in light snow. The only issue I have with it is turning corners. The back wheels are fixed, so the cart requires wide turns. With practice, I've learned to make the tight corners.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Stows nicely
customer_reviews.text: I’m an apartment dweller and my garbage dumpster is power far away. So I bought this with other things in mind plus I also purchased the net that can retain your items and has come in handy. It came to me fast and have now had it for a couple of months now. I believe I’ve tested the weight rating also and no strange creeps or cracks. Can’t wait to try it out in the woods for hunting gear transportation. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: New Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I had another one before this that lasted about a year and a half before it collapsed in the wheels gave out. I am so glad that other one fell apart. Otherwise I would not have bought this. This is great!! The wheels are a lot sturdier the entire wagon is put together very well. The cover over the wagon is spectacular. Very thick sturdy material and even comes with a cover That fits on top of the whole wagon when it is folded up That cover Makes it easy to store keeps it compact Very easy to hang up to hold a & carry because of that extra cover. A great purchase that I’ll have for many years
customer_reviews.author: bbb

customer_reviews.title: I love this wagon!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Camo to shake things up. Everyone has the solid colors. The quality of the fabric is excellent. I love the pull tab in the center to fold the wagon. The handle could be a bit longer, but it does collapse, which is nice. I am a short person, so I wonder how it feels to people who are taller. I have no issues or complaints. I bought this to replace a wagon I just bought two months prior that was twice as much that I quickly detested. This wagon steers easily, the handle has a comfortable grip, and it folds in a breeze. If I needed more than one, I would not hesitate to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: MadeinOregon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Its pink, maybe the only one so I had to get it for my daughter, who loves it! Its easy to fold and unfold. Its made of metal and everything seems to have been put together well. I haven't tested its upper limits in terms of weight or going over rougher terrain than a steep grass hill but so far we have had no issues with it and my daughter likes going places in it with her blankets, music, etc. I think if you don't abuse it, it will last a long time based on the construction.
customer_reviews.author: MobyS

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best purchase with a toddler
customer_reviews.text: This has been, hands down, one of my favorite purchases. It came fully assembled (folded up) in nice packaging. It’s sturdy, has a lock for the handle, and off road tires. It’s light weight and folds up to go in the trunk. We bought this for beach trips with our toddler but we have already used it to carry luggage to our hotel or take our daughter for walks, and I’m excited to use it at Halloween! I found this on sale for half of the price of the other wagons (about $60). It has the same tires as the $150 radio wagon. Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this wagon to haul groceries... it never had more than 70 pounds in it... wheel broke off from wagon after 10 months
customer_reviews.author: GeeTsWorld

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking twice to get it, now that I am moving to an apartment I know I’m gonna use it a lot!!!! It is very study, great material, easy to fold, not heavy at all, i’m 125 pounds btw, so it has a really good weight, I thought it was going to be smaller but it is a good size to carry groceries etc. 5 stars even though it came a day after the schedule delivery, I think it was UPS mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin Cherety

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 uses and 31 days after purchase - Update got new parts
customer_reviews.text: Update Oct 2020: After looking online, I found the Mac Sports website and support page. They sent me a replacement wheel and associated components. So a 4 for service, but a 2.5 for component quality. Original Aug 2020: Product arrived in good condition and we've used it a few times to wheel items down to a boat (so ~400yds traveled per use). After 6 outings, the wheel came off this morning and cannot be securely re-attached. Really disappointed, as the rest of the wagon seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: Moves really well very easy to fold and unfold great for apartments because of compact storage. Seems very sturdy and capable of holding heavy items if needed. I expect to get a lot of use out of this cart and am very happy with it so far. Initially bought it to potentially move my dog in because of a foot injury, fortunately it is healing quickly and he probably won’t need the cart. He is 52lbs and it would definitely hold him, but he is scared of it so will take some training to get him used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Francis

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favorite Purchases
customer_reviews.text: I love this collapsible wagon. It is durable, folds easy and easy to maneuver. It is another one of those purchases I have made during the pandemic. I use it for our deliveries more specifically groceries. I place my order, note that the wagon will be sitting outside my front door and ask them to place the items in the wagon and leave with no contact. I then go out after they have left, clean the items, trash the bags, wipe down the wagon, fold it away and wait until the next delivery. It is really handy during this time.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAutery

customer_reviews.title: Really good but stinky.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little one before he left so i could get him out in the fresh air for a "walk". It was amazing the boost it gave to his spirit, twas evident in his eyes. Everything was as advertised. The only caveat would be: there's a VERY heavy petroleum/plastic smell that permeated the whole house. But for normal yard usage and shed storage i could see this being apositive addition to one's tool shed. If you're going to use it as i did or as a tote you put in your car for catering or something like that I'd highly recommend letting it air out for a couple weeks first.
customer_reviews.author: potato cheesecake

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't ALL the Tires Move?
customer_reviews.text: Call me crazy, but it seems like having 4 tires that all actually spin should be a given for a wagon. One tire is at an angle such that it is jammed up against the frame and doesn't freely turn. That's a super basic thing that should never have gotten past quality control. The first think a QC checker should ask themselves is, "does this wagon have 4 moving tires?" If the answer is no, DON'T BOX IT UP AND SEND IT TO THE CUSTOMER. Super simple. I have a new one on the way, but I don't hold out a whole ton of hope after seeing this one.
customer_reviews.author: malinda lattin

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER for large loads
customer_reviews.text: LIFE SAVER! My boyfriend and I recently moved to a 4th floor apartment. Thankfully we have an elevator. A tip I got from a neighbor before moving in was getting a wagon for groceries because it’s a walk. I used it to shove stuff in to take into the elevator and move into our apartment and then we also used it to move out of our second floor apartment by filling it and carrying it with my boyfriend down the stairs. It’s the best. Highly recommend!!!!! We have two now! One for my car and one for his.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Mazar

customer_reviews.title: This is the best wagon!
customer_reviews.text: Yes. You can get cheaper ones. But you get what you pay for. This is sturdy & well balanced. It folds up with one pull of the strap. Unfolded, it holds lots of stuff of all sizes. During my move, it allowed me to make less trips. My back I’d indebted to this wagon. I love it so much; I bought this one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritace

product_meta.title: Mac Sports Collapsible Folding Outdoor Utility Wagon, Blue
product_meta.description: Style:Wagon| Color:Solid BlueEasily haul your gear with the MAC Sports Folding Utility Wagon. It opens in SECONDS! The lightweight durable design has a 150 lb. capacity and is a must have to transport heavy bulky loads. Great for trips to the park, camping, outdoor sporting events, gardening and much more! The accordion style floor makes set up and break down a breeze. It folds easily into its own carry bag for compact storage. MAC Sports is a trusted brand since 1993!
feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY - Sets up in seconds, No assembly required! Outside Dimensions Approx: 35" x 20" x 23". Size (inside)- Approx. 32 L x 20.1 W x 17.4 H inches. Size Unfolded- Approx. 35.5 L x 20.1 W x 22.5 H inches
LIGHTEN THE LOAD! - The heavy duty frame allows loads up to 150 lbs., and the Durable 600D Fabric can be easily cleaned. UV and mildew resistant
FUNCTIONAL FEATURES include an adjustable handle for effortless transport and 2 Mesh Cup holders to keep your beverages secure.Handle Length:Approx. 30.5 inch
EASY TRANSPORT - Perfect for hauling gear to outdoor sporting events, concerts, trips to the park or beach and great for use around the house. Please note that it is not made to transport children
CONVENIENT COMPACT STORAGE - Wagon folds to only 8" thick! Folded size approx. 29.5" x 20" x 8" and includes a convenient carry case. Product Weight- Approx. 22.5 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars14,867 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
